alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 10:51PM EST until January 04 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding, but will run high into the day on Tuesday. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM EST on Tuesday.
